official_title: A bill to authorize the use of funds appropriated to the Navy for the expenses for the Commission on Merchant Marine and Defense, and for other purposes.
short_title: Commission on Merchant Marine and Defense Amendments of 1985

summary.text: Commission on Merchant Marine and Defense Amendments of 1985 - Amends the Department of Defense Authorization Act, 1985 to authorize the use of funds appropriated for operations and maintenance of the Navy to pay for expenses of the Commission on Merchant Marine and Defense. Extends the time for submission of certain reports by the Commission.

titles.title: Commission on Merchant Marine and Defense Amendments of 1985
A bill to authorize the use of funds appropriated to the Navy for the expenses for the Commission on Merchant Marine and Defense, and for other purposes.
